name: Brightwing
title: Faerie Dragon
description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

abilities.name: Arcane Flare
abilities.description: Deal 260 damage in a small area and 87 damage in a larger area.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.description: Polymorph a target for 1.25 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 25% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

abilities.name: Pixie Dust
abilities.description: Increase target's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 25 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 25%.

heroics.name: Blink Heal
heroics.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 194. Stores up to 2 charges.

heroics.name: Emerald Wind
heroics.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 303 damage and pushing enemies away. Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 5%.

original.name: Brightwing
original.title: Faerie Dragon
original.description: Like many faerie dragons, Brightwing is happiest darting around the forests of Ashenvale, healing friends, and then grabbing a light snack. By the way, did you know a human head only weighs ten pounds? Talk about light!
original.shortDescription: A Healer who can teleport to allies, excelling on large battlegrounds.

trait.name: Soothing Mist
trait.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 109 every 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, teleport to an allied Hero.

skins.name: Faerie Dragon
skins.description: Like many faerie dragons, Brightwing is happiest darting around the forests of Ashenvale, healing friends, and then grabbing a light snack. By the way, did you know a human head only weighs ten pounds? Talk about light!

skins.name: Fey Dragon Brightwing
skins.description: The fey magic from which Brightwing draws her power is wild and chaotic. Her very form reflects its unstable nature, ever shifting, like an image from a dream.

skins.name: Flying Monkey Brightwing
skins.description: The magical flying creatures of Sky Temple often cause trouble for the locals. It can be hard to run a successful bazaar when your merchandise disappears into thin air.

skins.name: Monarch Brightwing
skins.description: Just like the flawless butterfly from which she takes her name, Monarch Brightwing has many ways to sting. Kneel peasant! For you face the Monarch! And her wrath is cruel...
